<!--Setup 10-mutate-map.R -->
```{r setup-10-mutate-map-r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```


<!--Load dictionary from file -->
```{r load-dictionary-from-file}
dict <- readxl::read_excel("data/cities.xlsx")
dict
```


<!--map() on a vector -->
```{r map-on-a-vector}
input_data <-
  dict %>%
  select(city_code, weather_filename) %>%
  deframe() %>%
  map(~ readxl::read_excel(here(.)))

input_data
```


<!--Lists are also vectors, enframe() returns a nested tibble! -->
```{r lists-are-also-vectors-enframe-returns-a-nested-tibble}
input_data %>%
  enframe()
```


<!--Operate in "tibble-land": columns are vectors -->
```{r operate-in-tibble-land-columns-are-vectors}
dict %>%
  select(city_code, weather_filename) %>%
  mutate(
    data = map(weather_filename, ~ readxl::read_excel(here(.)))
  )
```


<!--Keep auxiliary columns -->
```{r keep-auxiliary-columns}
dict %>%
  mutate(
    data = map(weather_filename, ~ readxl::read_excel(here(.)))
  ) %>%
  select(city_code, name, data)```
